CustomField.formula: IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Birth_Date__c ) ) , IF( DATE( YEAR(TODAY()) , MONTH( Birth_Date__c ) , DAY( Birth_Date__c ) ) <= DATE( YEAR(TODAY()) , MONTH( TODAY() ) , DAY( TODAY() ) ) , TEXT(YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( Birth_Date__c )) & " Years " , TEXT(YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( Birth_Date__c ) -1) & " Years ") , NULL) & IF( MONTH (Today()) = MONTH (Birth_Date__c) , IF(DAY(TODAY()) >= DAY(Birth_Date__c) , " " , " 11 Months" ) , IF(MONTH(Birth_Date__c) > MONTH(TODAY()) , TEXT(12 - (MONTH(Birth_Date__c) - MONTH(TODAY()))) & " Months" , TEXT(MONTH(TODAY()) - MONTH(Birth_Date__c)) & " Months" ) )
CustomField.label: Age
